title: SquidBreak
prattle: You wake up locked in a deserted jail cell, completely alone. There is nothing at all in your cell, useful or otherwise. For some reason, you have a splitting headache, which you would really like to get rid of.
What do you do?

title: Callie eat the pumpkin
prattle: Wait, seriously?

title: Eat the pumpkin Callie eat it
prattle: No, like, do you not—

title: EAT THE PUMPKIN CALLIE
prattle: Alright, well if you're really going to just go right for it, then I guess I have no choice.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: What Pumpkin?

title: Yell for help. Maybe Marie is nearby?
prattle: Despite your bellowing, Marie casually opens the door and leaves.

title: Lie down on the floor and cry
prattle: You try to lie down on the floor and cry, but you can't seem to get comfortable, and your tears don't come very naturally at all!
It must be all this dirt lying around everywhere. You can't think of a single other reason.

title: THERE. THE PUMPKIN. CALLIE GET IT
prattle: What p—

title: Uhh I mean Callie walk like five paces backwards, then turn around, then open your mouth and slam head into ground
prattle: I beg your pardon?

title: See if you can get through the bars in squid form!
prattle: Your clumsy tentacle accidentally flies through the bars, knocking out Marie (or was it Mary?), who'd had a change of heart.
Wow, what a mess you've made. Someone really needs to keep you on a leash!

title: SHES FUCKING DEAD!?
prattle: That is not a command!

title: Yell out an apology and ask if Mary/ie is alright
prattle: She's unconcious!

title: Callie you must cry in a corner. REPENT
prattle: Again with the dirt! Something is definitely off about this place. And you're going to get to the bottom of it or your name isn't that thing that your name is.

title: What’s back ther.e. Eat that thang like the pumpkin
prattle: As you turn around for no particular reason that you can recall, you notice the door to this cell, which of course has been unlocked this whole time.

title: Super jump through the bars of the door for a stylish escape
prattle: You try to super jump through the bars, but for some reason, you just hit your head on the door. Only once you've fallen back to the ground do you look back to the other side of the room and realize that the door was obviously just reflecting the bars over there.
You've really got to get your eyes checked!

title: EAT THE PUMPKIN… IT WILL HEAL U
prattle: You're quite certain there has never been, and never will be, a pumpkin in this room!
Besides, you are much more concerned with your inexplicable headache, which has only gotten worse since hitting your head just now.

title: scream in agony and/or frustration, then maybe smile through the pain once that's out of your system
prattle: You scream so hard you topple backwards over the pumpkin. As you lie on the floor looking up, you smile through the pain.

After all, besides the searing headache that probably isn't actually as big a deal as you're making it out to be and also probably doesn't exist because you're not seeing or hearing anything unusual, you're doing great!

title: OH THE PUMPKIN EXISTS. EAT IT
prattle: You wake up next to a broken ladder. You are covered in purple ink.

title: investigate wounds
prattle: Yep, that's Callie's ink, alright. Although it has a weird smell to it... Maybe it's actually Octarian ink? Yeah, that's probably it.
In any case, it's all over you, which makes sense given she shot you with it just now. Ew, there's a bunch stuck to your shoe too!

title: Collect the ink and shape it into a new Callie
prattle: Well that didn't work. Now all you have is a big purple puddle of being sad.

title: try door
prattle: The door is locked, just like it has been all day. You're not sure why you keep expecting this to change.

title: try going through the keyhole in squid form, grate style!
prattle: Upon closer examination, you realize that isn't actually a keyhole at all. It's just drawn on the door.
It's just as well, anyway. It's got that same weird smell as Callie's ink, and you're not sure if you can deal with that right now.

title: Punch down the door!
prattle: You try to punch down the door, but you forget that this door isn't reflecting any windows and accidentally send your fist flying through the bars!
It connects with the face of a random passer-by. Keys from his key ring jangle on the floor.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: All this flailing around is really getting you winded! Your VIGOR NEXUS accrues one FALLEN BREATH.

title: Take a breath.
prattle: Ah, that's better. There's nothing like a big gulp of fresh air to clear your head and recover your HP. Or, well, as fresh as it gets down here, anyway.

title: A MOMENT OF YOUR TIME, PLEASE, BEFORE WE CONTINUE.
prattle: OH, SORRY, AM I INTERRUPTING SOMETHING? MY APOLOGIES. I JUST FELT IT WOULD BE VALUABLE TO CLARIFY A FEW THINGS.

title: PLEASE, DO NOT WORRY.
prattle: YOUR REGULARLY SCHEDULED 'WHIMSY' WILL CONTINUE SHORTLY. AND I AM SURE OUR ACQUAINTANCE MARIE CAN HANDLE A BRIEF INTERRUPTION.
ISN'T THAT RIGHT, MARIE? BOGGLE VACANTLY IN A VAGUELY SOUTHWESTERLY DIRECTION FOR YES.
SEE? SHE'S FINE. GET OVER YOURSELVES.

title: NOW, IF YOU WOULD KINDLY JOIN ME.
prattle: WE'LL AWAY. TO MY ROOM.
PLEASE. TAKE A MOMENT, IF YOU WOULD. TO PERUSE MY VARIOUS INTERESTS. AS IS USUAL, THEY CAN ALL BE PLAINLY SEEN WITHIN THE BOUNDS OF THIS CONVENIENT RECTANGLE.
AND, OF COURSE, ONCE YOU ARE READY, FEEL FREE TO GET COMFORTABLE. THERE IS PLENTY OF ROOM ON THE UNBELIEVABLY SHITTY BED, I ASSURE YOU.
AH, YES, THERE YOU GO. SEATED JUST OFFSCREEN, BEYOND THE TERRIBLE DIARY, A PERFECT CHOICE. YOU LOOK SO VERY... EXTANT, OVER THERE.

title: BUT ENOUGH AIMLESS FLATTERY.
prattle: YES, YOU ARE HERE FOR A REASON, AFTER ALL. AND AS DELIGHTFUL AS IT WOULD NO DOUBT BE TO WASTE EVERYONE'S TIME AND THEN LAUGH AT THEM IN A PASSIVE AGGRESSIVE MANNER. I AM NOTHING IF NOT A STRAIGHTFORWARD WOMAN.
I AM HERE TO DISCUSS MY 'ROLE' IN THIS WORK.

title: I AM NOT THE CREATOR.
prattle: AT LEAST, NOT YET.
BUT OF COURSE, I AM RELATED. YES, I CAN SEE HER OVER THERE, SKETCHING AND SCRIBBLING. IMAGINING WORLDS. ENGAGING IN 'CRAFT'.
SHE IS MY SISTER, AFTER ALL. AND YET, AS IS THE WAY OF THINGS, SHE CANNOT EXPRESS IT WHILE I AM MAKING MY PRESENCE KNOWN.

title: AND SO, I OFFERED A PROPOSAL.
prattle: I WILL MAINTAIN THIS CREATION OF HERS, IN HER ABSENCE. I WILL HELP TO REALIZE HER VISIONS IN THESE FELL TIMES.
HOWEVER, I WILL DO SO MY WAY, AND ONLY MY WAY. I AM NOT ONE TO COMPROMISE WHEN IT COMES TO THE FORM OF MY SOUL, AFTER ALL. THIS SHOULD BE OBVIOUS BY THE WAY I'M DRESSED.

title: AND THAT IS REALLY ALL THERE IS TO SAY ON THE MATTER.
prattle: MY PRESENCE WILL BE KNOWN IN THE GARB OF THIS WEBSITE, OF COURSE. AND IN MY PARTICULAR. QUITE LEGALLY DISTINCT MANNER. OF SPEECH.
BUT BEYOND THAT, IT WILL BE MORE OR LESS IRRELEVANT TO YOU. WHICH IS WHY I HAVE CHOSEN TO PUT THIS LEVEL OF EFFORT. INTO TELLING YOU WHY THE WEBSITE IS PINK SOMETIMES.

title: THAT BEING SAID, I BID YOU ADIEU.
prattle: WHICH IS FRENCH FOR 'THE NEXT PAGE IS NORMAL. INSTEAD OF BEING ANNOYING.'

title: Try fixing the ladder?
prattle: AS THERE IS NOTHING AROUND WITH WHICH TO 'FIX' THE 'LADDER', YOU JUST SORT OF END UP WRESTLING IT FOR A BIT. IT'S KIND OF UNCOMFORTABLE TO WATCH.
YOU WILL HAVE TO BE MORE CREATIVE THAN THAT IF YOU WISH TO SOLVE MY MAZE. YOU WILL HAVE TO ENGAGE IN TOOL USE, AND SUFFERING. THIS IS THE WAY OF THINGS.

title: Lie on the ground and cry a little.
prattle: For no reason in particular, you feel as if your next step should be to 'engage in suffering'.
So, you lay down on the floor and cry, adding some flailing and squealing for good measure.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: You accidentally splash some tears on your INVISIBLE HAMMER. Thankfully, it's still intact, even though it smells kind of weird.
Your PULSE WIDTH SIFTULATOR revs into action!

title: SMASH THE DOOR WITH HAMMER
prattle: The hammer doesn't do much good against the metal door, but damn if it doesn't feel good to smack it anyway. Your VIGOR NEXUS is going wild!
Which is a bad thing, actually. You're not sure why you thought about it like it was a good thing just now? But you should probably stop banging, though.
You should probably. You should. Stop banging. Marie. Marie stop it. Stop. Stop it. Stop it! Stop it! STO—

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: You eventually uselessly bang on the door for so long that you miss the door and hit the doorknob instead. It goes flying off, and so does your hammer. And would you look at that, all the tears fell off of it, too, what a shame. Guess it's not going to appear onscreen anymore.
It's fine though. Your OVATION SCORE is still just barely in excess of your AUTHORITATION INDEX, and your HP didn't hit zero. You really cut it close there!
You slot the DOORKNOB into your INVENTORIUM.

title: Ink the walls and swim up them!
prattle: YOU WOULD LOVE TO COAT THE WALLS IN INK. YOU WOULD JUST FUCKING ADORE THAT. HOWEVER, YOU POSESS NO DEVICE WITH WHICH TO DO SO, WHICH IS KIND OF GOING TO BE A MASSIVE PROBLEM FOR THAT IDEA.
IT'S A SHAME, TOO, GIVEN THE INK TANK YOU JUST OBTAINED. BUT ALAS, EVERYONE KNOWS IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO EXTRACT INK FROM A TANK WITHOUT A TURF MODUS. IF ONLY THERE WERE ONE IN YOUR CELL.

title: Flop your squid form at the wall until some ink sticks.
prattle: YOU FLAIL USELESSLY AGAINST THE WALL, THANKFULLY AVOIDING ANY GREIVOUS INJURIES BUT NONTHELESS WREAKING HAVOC ON YOUR STUPID STATS BAR THING. YOUR HP IS STEADILY LOWERING, AND THE OTHER ONES ARE DOING CONCERNING THINGS AS WELL.
UNFORTUNATELY, MUCH AS YOU SMASH AND SPIT AND ATTEMPT TO SIMPLY CLIMB THIS WALL, IT STRANGELY ENOUGH SEEMS AS IF IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO EXTRACT INK FROM A TANK WITHOUT A TURF MODUS.

YOU HEAR THE OTHER ONE YELLING SOMETHING ABOUT A KEY. SHE'S PROBABLY SAYING HER CLASSIC CATCHPHRASE, 'DON'T FORGET THAT YOUR TURF MODUS IS THE KEY TO VICTORY'. SHE ALWAYS USED TO SAY THAT WHEN YOU WERE KIDS.

title: Smash the ink tank against the wall.
prattle: YOU REPEATEDLY BANG THE DOORKNOB INTO THE WALL FOR SOME REASON, REACHING A NEW ECHELON OF USELESS FLAILING IN THE PROCESS.
SERIOUSLY, YOUR MAGIC ARBITRARY READOUT KOWTOWOMETER HASN'T EVEN BOTHERED TO ESCALATE BEYOND ITS CURRENT STATUS OF HYPER-CRITICAL DEATHCON II. THAT'S HOW USELESS YOU'RE BEING.

HM? NO, THOSE AREN'T MY WORDS. THAT'S JUST WHAT THE OTHER ONE IS SAYING. THAT, AND CONSTANTLY SCREAMING HER CATCHPHRASE, OF COURSE, BUT THAT'S JUST SORT OF FADED INTO THE BACKGROUND RADIATION AT THIS POINT.

title: Toss the key up to Callie!
prattle: THE ROTATION MODUS IS FAR TOO HEAVY TO THROW THAT KIND OF DISTANCE. ESPECIALLY NOT IN YOUR CURRENT CONDITION.
